review: About what you would expect. Menus are well organized and very easy to navigate. I am still getting glitches about once be 30mins of streaming. There seems to be no easy way to diagnose whether this is an issue with my internet, my router or the stick. Additionally there seems to be no way to update firmware. I would assume there will be updates (hopefully fix the glitching). Finally there is not really as many shows/movie/etc. on amazon prime as I had hoped.

review: The Amazon fire stick works very well and is easy to set up. I downloaded the fire stick app on my iPhone which allows you to search by voice and works the same as the controller.
